00016 CCamera::CCamera():
00017         m_fNear(0.0f),
00018         m_fFar(0.0f),
00019         m_fFov(0.0f),

00034 // Init method ----------------------------------------------------------------+
00035 void CCamera::InitView(float fNear, float fFar, float fFov, float fViewAspect) {
00036         m_fNear = fNear;
00037         m_fFar = fFar;
00038         m_fFov = fFov;
00039         m_fAspectRatioInv = 1.0f/fViewAspect;
00040 
00041         // viewplane size:
00042         m_fViewplaneW = 2.0;
00043         m_fViewplaneH = 2.0f * m_fAspectRatioInv;
00044 
00045         // view distance:
00046         m_fViewDistance = (m_fViewplaneW*0.5f)/tan(DegToRad(m_fFov*0.5f));
00047 }
00048 // BuildMatrix method ---------------------------------------------------------+
00049 void CCamera::BuildMatrix(CameraMode cmMode) {
00050         switch (cmMode) {
00051                 case cmYawPitchRoll: {
00052                         float r = cos(m_fPitch);
00053                         float x = r*sin(m_fYaw);
00054                         float y = sin(m_fPitch);
00055                         float z = -r*cos(m_fYaw);
00056                         m_vTarget = VECTOR3D(x, y, z);
00057                         m_vUp = VECTOR3D(sin(m_fRoll), cos(m_fRoll), 0.0f);
00058                         break;
00059                 }
00060                 case cmSpherical: {
00061                         float r = cos(m_fPitch)*m_fRad;
00062                         float x = r*sin(m_fYaw);
00063                         float y = sin(m_fPitch)*m_fRad;
00064                         float z = -r*cos(m_fYaw);
00065                         m_vPos = VECTOR3D(x, y, z) + m_vTarget;
00066                         m_vUp = VECTOR3D(sin(m_fRoll), cos(m_fRoll), 0.0f);    
00067                         break;
00068                 }
00069         }
00070         glPushMatrix();
00071             // faster than calculatin it "manually" :)
00072             glLoadIdentity();
00073             gluLookAt(m_vPos.x, m_vPos.y, m_vPos.z,
00074               m_vTarget.x, m_vTarget.y, m_vTarget.z,
00075                           m_vUp.x, m_vUp.y, m_vUp.z);
00076             glGetFloatv(GL_MODELVIEW_MATRIX, (float *)m_matView.M);
00077         glPopMatrix();
00078 }
00079 // CalcPlanes method ----------------------------------------------------------+
00080 void CCamera::CalcPlanes() {
00081         VECTOR3D vBuf;
00082         
00083         m_fHNear = m_fNear*tan(DegToRad(m_fFov*0.5f));
00084         m_fHFar = m_fFar*tan(DegToRad(m_fFov*0.5f));
00085         float fWNear = m_fHNear/m_fAspectRatioInv;
00086         float fWFar = m_fHFar/m_fAspectRatioInv;
00087 
00088         // direction, up and right unit vector
00089         VECTOR3D vDir = m_vTarget - m_vPos;
00090         Vec3dNormalize(&vDir);
00091         
00092         VECTOR3D vUp = m_vUp;
00093         Vec3dNormalize(&vUp);
00094 
00095         VECTOR3D vRight = Vec3dCrossProduct(&vDir, &vUp);
00096         Vec3dNormalize(&vRight);
00097 
00098         vUp = Vec3dCrossProduct(&vRight, &vDir);
00099         Vec3dNormalize(&vUp);
00100 
00101         // front plane:
00102         m_pNear.p0 = m_vPos + m_fNear*vDir;
00103         m_pNear.n = -vDir;
00104 
00105         // far plane:
00106         m_pFar.p0 = m_vPos + m_fFar*vDir;
00107         m_pFar.n = vDir;
00108 
00109         // right plane:
00110         m_pRight.p0 = m_pNear.p0 - vRight*fWNear;
00111         vBuf = (m_pNear.p0 - vRight*fWNear)-m_vPos;
00112         Vec3dNormalize(&vBuf);
00113         m_pRight.n = Vec3dCrossProduct(&vUp, &vBuf);
00114         Vec3dNormalize(&m_pRight.n);
00115         
00116         // left plane:
00117         m_pLeft.p0 = m_pNear.p0 + vRight*fWNear;
00118         vBuf = (m_pNear.p0 + vRight*fWNear)-m_vPos;
00119         Vec3dNormalize(&vBuf);
00120         m_pLeft.n = Vec3dCrossProduct(&vBuf, &vUp);
00121         Vec3dNormalize(&m_pLeft.n);
00122 
00123         // bottom plane:
00124         m_pBottom.p0 = m_pNear.p0 - vUp*m_fHNear;
00125         vBuf = (m_pNear.p0 - vUp*m_fHNear)-m_vPos;
00126         Vec3dNormalize(&vBuf);
00127         m_pBottom.n = Vec3dCrossProduct(&vBuf, &vRight);
00128         Vec3dNormalize(&m_pBottom.n);
00129 
00130         // bottom plane:
00131         m_pTop.p0 = m_pNear.p0 + vUp*m_fHNear;
00132         vBuf = (m_pNear.p0 + vUp*m_fHNear)-m_vPos;
00133         Vec3dNormalize(&vBuf);
00134         m_pTop.n = Vec3dCrossProduct(&vRight, &vBuf);
00135         Vec3dNormalize(&m_pTop.n);
00136 }

00138 // IsPointInFrustum method ---------------------------------------------------------+
00139 bool CCamera::IsPointInFrustum(const POINT3D& pt, int iPlaneMode) {
00140         if (iPlaneMode & PM_NEAR_FAR) {
00141                 if (DistanceToPlane3d(&m_pNear, &pt) > 0.0 ||
00142                         DistanceToPlane3d(&m_pFar, &pt) > 0.0f) 
00143                         return false;
00144                 }
00145         if (iPlaneMode & PM_LEFT_RIGHT) {
00146                 if (DistanceToPlane3d(&m_pLeft, &pt) > 0.0 ||
00147                         DistanceToPlane3d(&m_pRight, &pt) > 0.0f) 
00148                         return false;
00149                 }
00150         if (iPlaneMode & PM_BOTTOM_TOP) {
00151                 if (DistanceToPlane3d(&m_pBottom, &pt) > 0.0 ||
00152                         DistanceToPlane3d(&m_pTop, &pt) > 0.0f) 
00153                         return false;
00154                 }
00155         return true;
00156         }
00157 // IsSphereInFrustum method ---------------------------------------------------+
00158 bool CCamera::IsSphereInFrustum(const POINT3D& pt, float fRadius, int iPlaneMode) {
00159         if (iPlaneMode & PM_NEAR_FAR) {
00160                 if (DistanceToPlane3d(&m_pNear, &pt) > fRadius ||
00161                         DistanceToPlane3d(&m_pFar, &pt) > fRadius) 
00162                         return false;
00163                 }
00164         if (iPlaneMode & PM_LEFT_RIGHT) {
00165                 if (DistanceToPlane3d(&m_pLeft, &pt) > fRadius ||
00166                         DistanceToPlane3d(&m_pRight, &pt) > fRadius) 
00167                         return false;
00168                 }
00169         if (iPlaneMode & PM_BOTTOM_TOP) {
00170                 if (DistanceToPlane3d(&m_pBottom, &pt) > fRadius ||
00171                         DistanceToPlane3d(&m_pTop, &pt) > fRadius) 
00172                         return false;
00173                 }
00174         return true;
00175         }

00177 // CalcFrutumPoints -----------------------------------------------------------+
00178 void CCamera::CalcFrustumPoints(POINT3D *pFPoints) {
00179         POINT3D pCenter;
00180         
00181         m_fHNear = m_fNear*tan(DegToRad(m_fFov*0.5f));
00182         m_fHFar = m_fFar*tan(DegToRad(m_fFov*0.5f));
00183         float fWNear = m_fHNear/m_fAspectRatioInv;
00184         float fWFar = m_fHFar/m_fAspectRatioInv;
00185 
00186         // direction, up and right unit vector
00187         VECTOR3D vDir = m_vTarget - m_vPos;
00188         Vec3dNormalize(&vDir);
00189         
00190         VECTOR3D vUp = m_vUp;
00191         Vec3dNormalize(&vUp);
00192 
00193         VECTOR3D vRight = Vec3dCrossProduct(&vDir, &vUp);
00194         Vec3dNormalize(&vRight);
00195 
00196         vUp = Vec3dCrossProduct(&vRight, &vDir);
00197         Vec3dNormalize(&vUp);
00198 
00199         // near plane:
00200         pCenter = m_vPos + m_fNear*vDir;
00201         pFPoints[0] = pCenter + vUp*m_fHNear - vRight*fWNear;
00202         pFPoints[1] = pCenter - vUp*m_fHNear - vRight*fWNear;
00203         pFPoints[2] = pCenter - vUp*m_fHNear + vRight*fWNear;
00204         pFPoints[3] = pCenter + vUp*m_fHNear + vRight*fWNear;
00205         pFPoints[4] = pCenter;
00206 
00207         // far plane:
00208         pCenter = m_vPos + m_fFar*vDir;
00209         pFPoints[5] = pCenter + vUp*m_fHFar - vRight*fWFar;
00210         pFPoints[6] = pCenter - vUp*m_fHFar - vRight*fWFar;
00211         pFPoints[7] = pCenter - vUp*m_fHFar + vRight*fWFar;
00212         pFPoints[8] = pCenter + vUp*m_fHFar + vRight*fWFar;
00213         pFPoints[9] = pCenter;
00214 }
00215 
00216 // DrawFrustum method ---------------------------------------------------------+
00217 void CCamera::DrawFrustum() {
00218         POINT3D pFPoints[11];
00219         VECTOR3D vBuf;
00220 
00221         CalcFrustumPoints(pFPoints);
00222         pFPoints[10] = m_vPos;
00223 
00224         // near plane:
00225         glColor3f(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f);
00226         glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
00227                 glVertex3fv(pFPoints[0].m);
00228                 glVertex3fv(pFPoints[1].m);
00229                 glVertex3fv(pFPoints[2].m);
00230                 glVertex3fv(pFPoints[3].m);
00231         glEnd();
00232 
00233     glBegin(GL_LINES);
00234                 vBuf = 3.0f*m_pNear.n + m_pNear.p0;
00235                 glVertex3fv(vBuf.m);
00236                 glVertex3fv(m_pNear.p0.m);
00237         glEnd();
00238 
00239         // far plane:
00240         glColor3f(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f);
00241         glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
00242                 glVertex3fv(pFPoints[5].m);
00243                 glVertex3fv(pFPoints[6].m);
00244                 glVertex3fv(pFPoints[7].m);
00245                 glVertex3fv(pFPoints[8].m);
00246         glEnd();
00247 
00248         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00249                 vBuf = 3.0f*m_pFar.n + m_pFar.p0;
00250                 glVertex3fv(vBuf.m);
00251                 glVertex3fv(m_pFar.p0.m);
00252         glEnd();
00253 
00254         // left plane:
00255         glColor3f(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f);
00256         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00257                 glVertex3fv(pFPoints[10].m);
00258                 glVertex3fv(pFPoints[5].m);
00259                 glVertex3fv(pFPoints[10].m);
00260                 glVertex3fv(pFPoints[6].m);
00261         glEnd();
00262 
00263         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00264                 vBuf = 3.0f*m_pLeft.n + m_pLeft.p0;
00265                 glVertex3fv(vBuf.m);
00266                 glVertex3fv(m_pLeft.p0.m);
00267         glEnd();
00268 
00269         // right plane:
00270         glColor3f(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f);
00271         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00272                 glVertex3fv(pFPoints[10].m);
00273                 glVertex3fv(pFPoints[7].m);
00274                 glVertex3fv(pFPoints[10].m);
00275                 glVertex3fv(pFPoints[8].m);
00276         glEnd();
00277 
00278         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00279                 vBuf = 3.0f*m_pRight.n + m_pRight.p0;
00280                 glVertex3fv(vBuf.m);
00281                 glVertex3fv(m_pRight.p0.m);
00282         glEnd();
00283 
00284         glColor3f(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f);
00285         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00286                 vBuf = 3.0f*m_pTop.n + m_pTop.p0;
00287                 glVertex3fv(vBuf.m);
00288                 glVertex3fv(m_pTop.p0.m);
00289         glEnd();
00290 
00291         glColor3f(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f);
00292         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00293                 vBuf = 3.0f*m_pBottom.n + m_pBottom.p0;
00294                 glVertex3fv(vBuf.m);
00295                 glVertex3fv(m_pBottom.p0.m);
00296         glEnd();
00297 }
